Abandon.definition: to give up with the intent of never again asserting or claiming an interest in

1.definition: to give up with the intent of never again asserting or claiming an interest in (a right or property)

2.definition: to disassociate oneself from or forsake in spite of a duty or responsibility to [ one's child]

3.definition: to renounce one's obligations and rights under [ a contract]

4.definition: to fail purposely to bring to completion or fruition [ a crime] [ a lawsuit]
